predicate.note: Frames file for 'quirk' based on sentences in BROWN corpus. No VN entry.

role.descr: thing quirking at or in response to

example.name: transitive, all args
example.text: Here , too , she-2 talked low , [*-2] quirking her head at one or another of the places , most often at Izaak 's armchair which [*T*-1] faced her across the long table .
example.arg: at one or another of the places , most often at Izaak 's armchair which [*T*-1] faced her across the long table
